mapper.insert: insert into out_train(ot_id, ot_title, proposer, proposer_department, duty_id, ot_date, application_date, course_name, training_location, training_money,course_desc,training_reason,in_users) values(#{outTrain.otId},#{outTrain.otTitle},#{outTrain.proposer},#{outTrain.proposerDepartment}, #{outTrain.dutyId},#{outTrain.otDate},#{outTrain.applicationDate},#{outTrain.courseName}, #{outTrain.trainingLocation},#{outTrain.trainingMoney},#{outTrain.courseDesc},#{outTrain.trainingReason},#{outTrain.inUsers})
mapper.select: select a.ot_id, a.ot_title, a.proposer, a.proposer_department, a.duty_id, a.ot_date, a.application_date,a.course_name, a.training_location, a.training_money,a.course_desc,a.training_reason,a.in_users,c.u_name from out_train as a left join mode_status as b on a.ot_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN user as c on a.proposer=c.user_id where b.status=2
